welcomeView.subtitle: Create and edit critical text editions

unsupportedFile.title: Unable to upload file
unsupportedFile.message: The selected file is not supported or is invalid.

unsupportedVersion.title: Unsupported document version
unsupportedVersion.message: The critix file you are trying to open is not supported by this version of Criterion.

alreadyOpen.title: Document already open
alreadyOpen.message: The document you are trying to open is already open in another tab.

unsupportedVersion.title: Unsupported style version
unsupportedVersion.message: The style file you are trying to import is not supported by this version of Criterion.

unsupportedVersion.title: Unsupported template version
unsupportedVersion.message: The template file you are trying to import is not supported by this version of Criterion.

toolbar.modalTitle: Select or remove items from the toolbar

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: View your recent notifications and updates.

types.share_new_version: New document version shared with you

linkPlaceholder: Insert the web page link here

file.label: File
file.newDescription: Create a new document from scratch or from a template.
file.openDescription: Open an existing document from your device.
file.openRecentDescription: Quickly reopen documents you've worked on recently.
file.closeDescription: Close the current document without exiting the application.
file.saveDescription: Save changes to the current document using its existing name and location.
file.saveAsDescription: Save the document with a new name or location.
file.renameDescription: Change the name of the current document.
file.moveToDescription: Relocate the document to a different folder or storage location.

exportTo.label: Export To
exportTo.pdfDescription: Export the document as a PDF for sharing or printing.
exportTo.xmlDescription: Export the document in XML/TEI format for scholarly or archival use.

file.saveAsTemplateDescription: Save the current document as a reusable template for future projects.
file.metadataDescription: View or edit document metadata (e.g., title, author, keywords).
file.pageSetupDescription: Adjust page size, margins, orientation, and other layout settings.
file.printDescription: Send the document to a printer with preview and print options.

edit.label: Edit

find.label: Find
find.description: Search for specific text and optionally replace it with different text.

edit.redoDescription: Restore an action that was undone.
edit.cutDescription: Remove selected content and copy it to the clipboard.
edit.copyDescription: Copy selected content to the clipboard.
edit.copyStyleDescription: Copy the formatting of selected text for reuse.
edit.pasteDescription: Insert clipboard content at the current cursor position.
edit.pasteStyleDescription: Apply previously copied formatting to selected text.
edit.pasteTextWithoutFormattingDescription: Paste clipboard text as plain text, discarding all original styling.
edit.selectAllDescription: Select all content in the current document or field.

menu.preferencesDescription: Customize how Criterion behaves — adjust editing, display, saving, and interface options to match your workflow.

insert.label: Insert
insert.commentDescription: Add an editorial or explanatory note to the selected text.
insert.bookmarkDescription: Insert a named marker to quickly navigate to this location later.
insert.linkDescription: Add a hyperlink to a web address, document section, or external resource.
insert.symbolDescription: Insert a special character or symbol not available on the keyboard.
insert.pageBreakDescription: Force the text to start on a new page at the cursor position.

lineNumber.label: Line Number
lineNumber.noneDescription: Hide line numbers in the document.

insert.author: Author
insert.title: Title

references.label: References
references.addNoteDescription: Insert a scholarly apparatus note (e.g., critical, section, page, inner, outer) using the selected apparatus layer.
references.swapMarginDescription: Move the current note to the opposite margin (e.g., from left to right or vice versa).
references.addReadingTypeDescription: Tag a reading with a specific editorial classification (e.g., addition, omission, correction).
references.addReadingSeparatorDescription: Insert a visual or logical separator between variant readings in an apparatus note.
references.addSiglumDescription: Insert a manuscript or source siglum (abbreviation) into the current note.
references.siglaSetupDescription: Define, edit, or manage the list of sigla (source identifiers) used in your project.
references.addCitationDescription: Insert a reference to a bibliographic entry within the text or notes.
references.bibliographyDescription: View, edit, or manage the document's bibliography entries.
references.referencesFormatDescription: Choose or customize the reading separator, reading type separator, guide colors, page/section notes appearance.

format.label: Format

font.label: Font
font.underlineDescription: Add an underline to selected text.
font.strikethroughDescription: Draw a line through selected text to indicate deletion or revision.
font.superscriptDescription: Raise and shrink selected text (e.g., for footnotes or exponents).
font.subscriptDescription: Lower and shrink selected text (e.g., for chemical formulas).
font.npcDescription: Show or hide invisible characters like spaces, tabs, and paragraph marks.

ligature.label: Ligature
ligature.defaultDescription: Apply standard typographic ligatures based on the font.
ligature.allDescription: Enable all available ligatures in the font.

capitalization.label: Capitalization
capitalization.noneDescription: Use original text casing without automatic changes.
capitalization.allCapsDescription: Display selected text in uppercase letters.
capitalization.smallCapsDescription: Show uppercase letters at small-cap height.
capitalization.titleCaseDescription: Capitalize the first letter of each major word.
capitalization.startCaseDescription: Capitalize only the first letter of the first word.

text.label: Text
text.alignLeftDescription: Align text to the left margin.
text.alignRightDescription: Align text to the right margin.
text.justifyDescription: Align text to both left and right margins.
text.increaseIndentDescription: Move the selected paragraph farther from the left margin.
text.decreaseIndentDescription: Move the selected paragraph closer to the left margin.

spacing.label: Spacing
spacing.singleDescription: Set line spacing to one line height.
spacing.1_15Description: Apply slightly expanded single line spacing.
spacing.oneAndHalfDescription: Set line spacing to one and a half lines.
spacing.doubleDescription: Set line spacing to two lines.
spacing.customDescription: Define custom line or paragraph spacing.

list.numberDescription: Apply numbered list format using digits.
list.maxLetterDescription: Apply numbered list format using uppercase letters.
list.lowerLetterDescription: Apply numbered list format using lowercase letters.
list.maxRomanDescription: Apply numbered list format using uppercase Roman numerals.
list.lowerRomanDescription: Apply numbered list format using lowercase Roman numerals.
list.pointDescription: Apply bulleted list format using solid bullets.
list.emptyPointDescription: Apply bulleted list format using open bullets.
list.squareDescription: Apply bulleted list format using square bullets.
list.label: List
list.resumeNumberingDescription: Continue numbering from a previous list at the appropriate next number.
list.continuePreviousNumberingDescription: Automatically link to and continue the numbering of the most recent list.

pageNumber.label: Page Number...
pageNumber.description: Insert page numbers in headers, footers.

format.sectionsStyleDescription: Apply or manage formatting styles for document sections (e.g., headings, apparatus layers).
format.removeLinkDescription: Delete the hyperlink from selected linked text.
format.changeTemplateDescription: Apply a different document template, updating styles and layout.

layout.label: Layout...
layout.description: Adjust overall document layout settings (e.g., columns, spacing, section breaks).

toc.label: Table of Contents...
toc.description: Edit the content and formatting of the Table of Contents.

lineNumber.label: Line Number...
lineNumber.description: Configure or insert line numbers in the document.

headerFooter.headerDescription: Edit the content and formatting of the page header.
headerFooter.footerDescription: Edit the content and formatting of the page footer.
headerFooter.label: Header && Footer...
headerFooter.description: Edit the content and formatting of the header and footer.

keyboard.label: Keyboard
keyboard.customizeShortcutsDescription: Customize keyboard shortcuts to match your preferences.

view.label: View
view.tableOfContentsDescription: Display or hide the document's interactive table of contents.
view.toolbarDescription: Show or hide the main toolbar with quick-access formatting and editing tools.
view.customizeToolbarDescription: Add, remove, or rearrange buttons on the toolbar to suit your workflow.
view.statusBarDescription: Show or hide the status bar at the bottom of the window (displays page info, word count, etc.).
view.customizeStatusBarDescription: Choose which information (e.g., total words, total characters, author) appears in the status bar.
view.printPreviewDescription: View how the document will look when printed — before sending it to the printer.
view.zoomDescription: Adjust the display size of the document (zoom in/out or fit to screen).
view.expandCollapseDescription: Toggle between expanded view (show all content) and collapsed view (hide sections/notes for focus).

help.label: Help
help.criterionHelpDescription: Open the built-in help guide or user manual to find answers, tutorials, or feature explanations.
help.aboutDescription: View version information, licensing details, and credits for the Criterion application.

buttons.saveAndApply: Save and apply to the whole document

bibliography.title: Bibliographies
bibliography.name: Name

empty.title: Create a Bibliography before adding citations

error.title: Bibliography already exists
error.maxLength: Bibliography name cannot be longer than 50 characters

bibliography.delete: You are about to delete the bibliography. Are you sure you want to proceed?

references.title: References
references.delete: You are about to delete the bibliographic reference. Are you sure you want to proceed?

bookTitle.pattern: Book Title should be proper text.

seriesNumber.pattern: Series Number should be proper text.

numberOfVolumes.pattern: Number of Volumes should be proper text.

doi.pattern: DOI must be a valid DOI format.

date.pattern: Date must be in YYYY-MM-DD or MM-DD-YYYY or DD-MM-YYYY or MM/DD/YYYY or DD/MM/YYYY or YYYY/MM/DD format.

pages.pattern: Pages must be a range or list like '123-125,128'.

shortTitle.pattern: Short Title should be proper text.

url.pattern: URL must start with http:// or https://.

accessed.pattern: Accessed date must be in YYYY-MM-DD or MM-DD-YYYY or DD-MM-YYYY or MM/DD/YYYY or DD/MM/YYYY or YYYY/MM/DD format.

referencesFormat.title: References Format

warningBadge.title: Warning:
warningBadge.message: The 'Save' and 'Save & Apply to Entire Document' functions serve the same purpose here: both apply the settings to the entire document.

referencesFormat.customizeSeparators: Customize critical notes separators characters and style.
referencesFormat.customizeGuideColors: Text highlights that are not included in print.

show.label: Show
show.description: Line numbers are shown near the text inserted into Introduction, Critical Text, Bibliography.

metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.subject: Subject
metadata.author: Author
metadata.keywordsPlaceholder: Write down the keyword and press enter...

persistentIdentifier.label: Persistent Identifier
persistentIdentifier.description: A DOI or PID or other permanent ID allowing to uniquely identify the document

manager.label: Manager
manager.description: The name of the manager or supervisor overseeing the document's creation or project.

company.label: Company
company.description: The name of the organization or business associated with the document.

publisher.label: Publisher
publisher.description: The name of the organization or business publishing the "final" version of the document.

licenseInformation.label: License Information
licenseInformation.description: The content or URL to the document that describes the license information.

category.label: Category
category.description: A classification or type of the document, such as "Report," "Proposal," or "Research."

comments.label: Comments
comments.description: General notes or remarks about the document, often used for additional context.

lastAuthor.label: Last Author
lastAuthor.description: The name of the last person to save or edit the document.

revisionNumber.label: Revision Number
revisionNumber.description: Tracks the number of times the document has been saved.

totalEditingTime.label: Total Editing Time
totalEditingTime.description: The cumulative amount of time spent editing the document.

lastPrintedDate.label: Last Printed Date
lastPrintedDate.description: The date and time when the document was last printed.

contentStatus.label: Content Status
contentStatus.description: Describes the current condition or usage state of the document, often for workflow purposes.

contentType.label: Content Type
contentType.description: A technical descriptor for the document's format, e.g., "application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.wordprocessingml.document."

wordCount.label: Word Count
wordCount.description: The total number of words in the document.

characterCountWithSpaces.label: Character Count (with spaces)
characterCountWithSpaces.description: The total number of characters, including spaces.

characterCountNoSpaces.label: Character Count (no spaces)
characterCountNoSpaces.description: The total number of characters, excluding spaces.

lineCount.label: Line Count
lineCount.description: The total number of lines in the document.

paragraphCount.label: Paragraph Count
paragraphCount.description: The total number of paragraphs in the document.

pageCount.label: Page Count
pageCount.description: The total number of pages in the document.

customName.label: Custom Name
customName.description: The user-defined name of the custom property, such as "Project Name" or "Deadline."

valueType.label: Value Type
valueType.description: The type of value associated with the custom property, such as Text, Date, Number, or Yes/No.

value.label: Value
value.description: The specific information or data tied to the custom property, entered by the user.

confirmationModal.title: Are you sure you want to permanently delete "{{apparatus}}" ?
confirmationModal.description: All notes for "{{apparatus}}" with any comments related to the text will be permanently deleted and it will not be possible to undo this action.

edit_mode.description_error_message: The description must be less than {{length}} characters.
edit_mode.category_title_error_message_min_length: The category title must be at least {{length}} characters long.
edit_mode.category_title_error_message_max_length: The category title must be less than {{length}} characters.
edit_mode.title_error_message_min_length: The title must be at least {{length}} characters long.
edit_mode.title_error_message_max_length: The title must be less than {{length}} characters.

delete_bookmark_dialog.title: If you continue, you will delete the bookmark
delete_bookmark_dialog.description: If you continue, you will delete the bookmark. Do you want to continue? If yes please click on "Delete" button, if no click on "Cancel" button; alternatively.

delete_bookmark_category_dialog.title: If you continue, you will delete every bookmarks in the category
delete_bookmark_category_dialog.description: Do you want to continue? If yes please click on "Delete" button, if no click on "Cancel" button; alternatively move the all bookmarks to another caregory created with the "Move" button

move_bookmark_dialog.title: Move bookmark
move_bookmark_dialog.description: Select a category to move the bookmark.

move_bookmarks_dialog.title: Move all bookmarks
move_bookmarks_dialog.description: Select a category to move the bookmarks.

edit_mode.title_error_message_min_length: The title must be at least {{length}} characters long.
edit_mode.title_error_message_max_length: The title must be less than {{length}} characters.
edit_mode.description_error_message: The title must be less than {{length}} characters.
edit_mode.category_title_error_message_min_length: The category title must be at least {{length}} characters long.
edit_mode.category_title_error_message_max_length: The category title must be less than {{length}} characters.

delete_comment_dialog.title: If you continue, you will delete the comment
delete_comment_dialog.description: If you continue, you will delete the comment. Do you want to continue? If yes please click on "Delete" button, if no click on "Cancel" button; alternatively.

delete_comment_category_dialog.title: If you continue, you will delete every comments in the category
delete_comment_category_dialog.description: Do you want to continue? If yes please click on "Delete" button, if no click on "Cancel" button; alternatively move the all comments to another caregory created with the "Move" button

move_comment_dialog.title: Move comment
move_comment_dialog.description: Select a category to move the comment.

move_comments_dialog.title: Move all comments
move_comments_dialog.description: Select a category to move the comments.

close_document_dialog.title: This document contains unsaved changes
close_document_dialog.description: Do you want to save your changes before closing the document?

delete_apparatus_dialog.title: Delete apparatus
delete_apparatus_dialog.description: You are about to permanently delete all existing apparatus notes and any comments associated with the text. Are you sure you want to proceed? It will not be possible to undo this action!

delete_apparatus_entry_dialog.title: Delete apparatus note
delete_apparatus_entry_dialog.description: You are about to permanently delete the apparatus note and any comments associated with the text. Are you sure you want to proceed? It will not be possible to undo this action!

restoreCriterionLayout.title: Restore Criterion layout
restoreCriterionLayout.rememberLastLayoutDescription: Saves and restores the last visual layout of the editing session.

recentFiles.title: Recent files to open
recentFiles.description: Show the maximum number of files recently opened to be displayed.

commentPreviewLimit.title: Comment preview character limit
commentPreviewLimit.description: The number of characters shown for each comment in left sidebar.

bookmarkPreviewLimit.title: Bookmark preview character limit
bookmarkPreviewLimit.description: The number of characters shown for each bookmark in left sidebar.

restoreLayout.title: Restore layout
restoreLayout.rememberLastLayoutDescription: Saves and restores the last visual layout of the editing session.

showHistoryActions.title: Show history actions
showHistoryActions.description: The maximum number of history actions to show.

account.title: Criterion Access
account.subtitle: View and manage your personal information
account.signInPrompt: Sign in to access your documents and sync your settings
account.name: Name
account.passwordResetError: Failed to send password reset email
account.loginPrompt: Please sign in to view and manage your account

deleteAccountDialog.title: Delete Account
deleteAccountDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action is irreversible.
deleteAccountDialog.warning: All your data, documents, and personal information will be permanently deleted. You will be logged out immediately.

changePasswordDialog.logoutNotice: You will be signed out and returned to the login screen
changePasswordDialog.errorUnauthorized: Sign-in failed. Check your credentials and try again.
changePasswordDialog.errorMaxRequests: Too many requests. Please try again later
changePasswordDialog.errorUnknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later

importDialog.title: There are {{count}} siglums that are already present in the document. Do you want to replace them?
importDialog.versionNotSupported: The siglum file you are trying to import is not supported by this version of Criterion.

description.warning: Warning: The new template will remove the following number of apparatuses:
description.irreversible: If the document has not been previously saved, this content will be permanently lost. We recommend saving the document before proceeding.
description.continue: Do you want to proceed anyway?

pdf.compilationFailed: PDF not generated: LaTeX compilation failed

preview.notAvailable: Warning! The Print preview of the current document is not available. Please regenerate the print preview.
preview.failedToLoad: Failed to load Print Preview PDF
preview.invalidDataFormat: Invalid PDF data format for print preview

viewer.fileNotFound: PDF file not found or no longer available

export.title: Generating PDF...
export.detail: The operation will continue in the background and may take several seconds. A message will be shown when the PDF is generated.

keyboardShortcuts.title: Customize Keyboard Shortcuts
keyboardShortcuts.placeholder: Click here and press a shortcut to create a new one
keyboardShortcuts.helpTextMac: Press a key combination (e.g., Cmd+Shift+Z). You cannot use modifiers alone.
keyboardShortcuts.helpTextWinLinux: Press a key combination (e.g., Ctrl+Shift+Z). You cannot use modifiers alone.
keyboardShortcuts.conflictMessage: This shortcut is already assigned to "{{conflict}}". Please choose a different shortcut or remove it from the conflicting command first.
keyboardShortcuts.reservedShortcut: This shortcut is reserved by the system and cannot be assigned. Please choose a different shortcut.
keyboardShortcuts.selectCommand: Select a command to customize its shortcut
keyboardShortcuts.resetConfirmation: Are you sure you want to reset all shortcuts to default? This action cannot be undone.
keyboardShortcuts.errorMessage: Failed to assign shortcut. Please try again.
keyboardShortcuts.errorUnknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again or contact support if the issue persists.
keyboardShortcuts.reservedDevTools: This shortcut is reserved by DevTools and cannot be assigned.
keyboardShortcuts.reservedOS: This shortcut is reserved by the operating system and cannot be assigned.
keyboardShortcuts.reservedMacOption: On macOS, Option+letter/number produces special characters and cannot be used as shortcuts. Use Cmd+Option+Key instead.

validation.needsModifier: Letters and numbers require at least one modifier ({{modifier}} or Alt).
validation.shiftOnlyNotAllowed: Shift alone is not sufficient for letters/numbers. Add {{modifier}} or Alt.
validation.modifiersOnly: You pressed only modifiers. Add a key (letter, number, F-key, or special key).
validation.functionKeyValid: Function key {{key}} is valid! You can also add modifiers.
validation.validShortcut: Valid shortcut! Click 'Assign' to save it.
validation.escapeNotAllowed: Escape key cannot be used as a shortcut.
validation.tabNotRecommended: Tab key is not recommended as it may interfere with navigation.
validation.macOptionConflict: On macOS, Option+letter/number produces special characters (like å, ∑, ™) and cannot be used as shortcuts.
validation.macOptionConflictExample: Use Cmd+Option+{{key}} instead of Option+{{key}} alone.

export.title: XML/TEI Export in Progress...
export.detail: The operation will continue in the background and may take several seconds. A message will be shown when the XML/TEI file is generated.

dialog.title: Export document as XML/TEI
dialog.description: The document will be exported in XML/TEI format. Click 'Export' to proceed.

signIn.title: Sign in to your account
signIn.subtitle: Enter your credentials to access your dashboard
signIn.loginSuccessDescription: Welcome back! You have been signed in successfully.
signIn.loginErrorDescription: Invalid email or password. Please try again.
signIn.errorToastCredentialsDescription: Invalid email or password. Please try again.

signUp.title: Create an account
signUp.subtitle: Enter your details to get started
signUp.name: Name
signUp.errorToastEmailAlreadyExistsDescription: The provided email is already in use.
signUp.errorToastInvalidDataDescription: The provided data is not valid.

verifyEmailAccount.title: Verify your email
verifyEmailAccount.subtitle: We've sent a verification code to your email address.
verifyEmailAccount.errorToastInvalidCodeDescription: The verification code is incorrect. Please check and try again.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot password?
forgotPassword.subtitle: No worries, we'll send you reset instructions.

verifyCode.title: Verify your email
verifyCode.subtitle: We've sent a verification code to your email address.

verificationSuccess.title: Email verified!
verificationSuccess.subtitle: Your email has been successfully verified. You can now sign in to your account.

validation.passwordMin: Password must be at least 8 characters
validation.passwordMax: Password must be at most 255 characters
validation.passwordLowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
validation.passwordUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
validation.passwordDigit: Password must contain at least one digit
validation.passwordSymbol: Password must contain at least one symbol (!#@&%$)
validation.passwordDifferent: New password must be different from current password
validation.nameMin: Name must be at least 2 characters
validation.nameMax: Name must be at most 50 characters
validation.nameInvalidChars: Name can only contain letters, spaces and apostrophes
validation.surnameMin: Surname must be at least 2 characters
validation.surnameMax: Surname must be at most 50 characters
validation.surnameInvalidChars: Surname can only contain letters, spaces and apostrophes
validation.keywordMax: Each keyword must be at most 40 characters
validation.keywordsTotalLength: Total length of all keywords must be at most 255 characters
validation.institutionMax: Institution must be at most 255 characters
validation.institutionInvalidChars: Institution can only contain letters, spaces and apostrophes
validation.acceptTermsRequired: You must accept the terms and privacy policy

logout.title: Sign out of your account?
logout.subtitle: Are you sure you want to sign out of:
logout.warning: This will sign you out of your account and all connected services.

userNotVerified.title: Account not verified
userNotVerified.instruction: Please verify your email address to continue using the application.

share.title: Share Document with Collaborators
share.invitationMessagePlaceholder: Enter a message for your collaborators (max 255 characters)...
share.successDescription: The document has been successfully shared with the selected collaborators

sharedFiles.title: Shared documents
sharedFiles.activeDocumentDescription: Documents highlighted in blue are currently open and in focus in Criterion editor. Collaborative actions (Share, Upload, Delete) are only enabled for the document you're actively working on.
sharedFiles.newVersionAvailableDescription: Rows highlighted in red indicate that a new version of the document has been uploaded by the owner. Download the latest version to access the most recent changes.
sharedFiles.revokeConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to revoke this invitation? The collaborator will no longer be able to accept it.
